name: Seal Adventure
description:
this game is in early prototype stage and we need play testers and bugfinders, to improve this game further and expand on the vision and make this a fantastic game



Seals are truly weird creatures, they roll around and are very goofy on land, but in the oceans they are fiersome hunters, masters of diving and fishing. In this game you will need to master all the survival skills of a seal as a seal, to carry on and survive the dangers of global warming, go on a beautiful adventure over the arctic lands, live the life of a bouncy seal and experience the dangers they face.

core features
dive and catch fish explore the sea world socialize with other seals raise seal pups day and night great graphics controls most are listed in the game but might be incorect right click or right trigger to boost in water b to cancel most things notify me for more questions








Follow us on social media to keep updated

(bug submitions form)
